citethispage-desc: Voeg 'n spesiale bladsy by vir [[Special:CiteThisPage|verwysings]] en 'n skakel daarna onder Gereedskap
tooltip-citethispage: Inligting oor hoe u hierdie bladsy kan verwys
citethispage-content:
__NOTOC__
== Bibliografiese besonderhede vir {{FULLPAGENAME}} == * Bladsynaam: {{FULLPAGENAME}} * Outeur: {{SITENAME}}-bydraers * Uitgewer: ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. * Datum van jongste hersiening: {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * Datum verkry: {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * Permanente URL: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} * Bladsy se weergawe-ID: {{REVISIONID}}
== Aanhalingstyle vir {{FULLPAGENAME}} == === [[APA style]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}. ({{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}). ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. Retrieved {{CURRENTTIME}}, {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}} from {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[The MLA style manual|MLA style]] === "{{FULLPAGENAME}}." ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC. {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}>. === [[MHRA Style Guide|MHRA style]] === {{SITENAME}} contributors, '{{FULLPAGENAME}}', ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC, <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}> [besoek op {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}] === [[The Chicago Manual of Style|Chicago style]] === {{SITENAME}} contributors, "{{FULLPAGENAME}}," ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (besoek op {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === [[Council of Science Editors|CBE/CSE style]] === {{SITENAME}} contributors. {{FULLPAGENAME}} [Internet]. {{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}; {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC [cited {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTDAY}}]. Beskikbaar vanaf: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[Bluebook|Bluebook style]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}, {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (last visited {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === [[BibTeX]]-inskrywing === @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}", note = "[Aanlyn; besoek op {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" } Wanneer u die [[LaTeX]]-pakket "url" gebruik (\usepackage{url} êrens aan die begin van die dokument) wat webadresse mooier laat vertoon, verkies u dalk die volgende: @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "'''\url{'''{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}'''}'''", note = "[Aanlyn; besoek op {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" }
